Name: *open
Doc: If True, the dialog is visible. If False, it is hidden.

Name: cancel_action
Doc:
Name of a function that is triggered hen the cancel button Is pressed. The parameters of that function are all optional:
  • gui instance
  • id
  • action
If cancel_action is empty, the button is not shown.

Name: cancel_label
Doc: The text of the cancel button.

Name: validate_action
Doc:
Name of a function that is triggered when the validate button is pressed. The parameters of that function are all optional:
  • gui instance
  • id
  • action
If cancel_action is empty, the button is not shown.

Name: validate_label
Doc: The text of the validate button.

Name: partial
Doc: A Partial object that holds the content of the dialog. This should be defined if page_id is set.

Name: page_id
Doc: The page identifier to show as the content of the dialog. This should not be defined if partial is set.

Name: width
Doc:
The width, in CSS units, of this dialog.
(CSS property)

Name: height
Doc:
The height, in CSS units, of this dialog.
(CSS property)
